scenes.description: Opening title for hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2025-2026.
Yuku Holo Kuru Holo 2023! Year-End/New Year Date Voice teaser.
Countdown to the New Year with hololive members.
Kuru Holo 2024! New Year Date Voice promotion and final greetings.

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンクラブ！
subtitles.english: Hololive Fan Club!

subtitles.original: 一条莉々華だよ！
subtitles.english: It's Ichijou Lirika!

subtitles.original: I'm Mori Calliope.
subtitles.english: I'm Mori Calliope.

subtitles.original: ホロライブファンクラブ、始まりました！
subtitles.english: Hololive Fan Club has begun!

subtitles.original: ここだけのオリジナルグッズや、チケット先行抽選。
subtitles.english: Exclusive original goods and early ticket lottery.

subtitles.original: 他にも楽しいコンテンツがいっぱい！
subtitles.english: And many other fun contents!

subtitles.original: Campaigns too? That sounds really fun. I'm curious.
subtitles.english: Campaigns too? That sounds really fun. I'm curious.

subtitles.original: さあみんな、ホロライブファンクラブで一緒に楽しもう！
subtitles.english: Now everyone, let's enjoy Hololive Fan Club together!

subtitles.original: Join us now!
subtitles.english: Join us now!

subtitles.original: ゆくホロくるホロ2023! 年末年始デートボイス
subtitles.english: Yuku Holo Kuru Holo 2023! Year-End/New Year Date Voice

subtitles.original: ここは露天風呂が有名だって言うから、
subtitles.english: I heard the open-air bath here is famous,

subtitles.original: ずっと気になってたんだよね〜！
subtitles.english: so I've been curious about it for a long time!

subtitles.original: ……ね、キミも一緒に行かない？
subtitles.english: ...Hey, won't you come with me?

subtitles.original: ええっ！？一緒に、入るって意味じゃないよ！？
subtitles.english: Eh!? I don't mean entering *together*!?

subtitles.original: おーそーじ！モココ、大掃除やってみたいんだよね！
subtitles.english: Big clean-up! Mococo wants to try doing a big clean-up!

subtitles.original: もちろんキミも一緒にやるんだよ！？
subtitles.english: Of course, you're doing it with me!?

subtitles.original: じゃあさっそく大掃除、開始だ〜！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's start the big clean-up!

subtitles.original: え〜？服のすきまがどうしたって〜？
subtitles.english: Eh~? What about the gap in my clothes~?

subtitles.original: 僕が掃除している間に、キミはいったいどこを見てたのかな〜？
subtitles.english: I wonder where you were looking while I was cleaning~?

subtitles.original: お〜！ここが夢にまで見た日本の温泉街〜♪
subtitles.english: Oh~! This is the Japanese hot spring town I've dreamed of~♪

subtitles.original: ん？もしかして……
subtitles.english: Hm? Could it be...

subtitles.original: 私と一緒に入りたいなとか、思ってる？
subtitles.english: ...you're thinking you want to get in with me?

subtitles.original: ……いいよ、一緒に入ろっか……？
subtitles.english: ...Okay, shall we get in together...?

subtitles.original: って、やばいやばい！みんな、そろそろカウントダウン始まるよ！
subtitles.english: Wait, oh no! Everyone, the countdown is about to start!

subtitles.original: ハッピーニューイヤー！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: あけましておめでとうございます！今年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year! I look forward to working with you this year too!

subtitles.original: えへへ……なんかあらためてかしこまると、はずかしくて照れちゃうね♪
subtitles.english: Ehehe... getting formal like this is a bit embarrassing and makes me blush♪

subtitles.original: ダイヤモンド富士っていうんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Is it called Diamond Fuji?

subtitles.original: ほらほら！だんだん富士山の輪郭が見えてきたよ！
subtitles.english: Look look! The outline of Mt. Fuji is gradually becoming visible!

subtitles.original: なんだかもう、この景色だけで感動するよ〜！
subtitles.english: Somehow, I'm already moved just by this scenery~!

subtitles.original: 突然ですが、おせちを作りまーす！
subtitles.english: It's sudden, but I'm going to make Osechi!

subtitles.original: つまみ食いしちゃだめだよ？
subtitles.english: No snacking, okay?

subtitles.original: もしつまみ食いしちゃったら……
subtitles.english: If you sneak a bite...

subtitles.original: ……ガブってしちゃうからねっ！？
subtitles.english: ...I'll take a big chomp!

subtitles.original: おめでとー！おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Congrats! Congrats!

subtitles.original: キミとぎゅーしながらお祝い♪
subtitles.english: Celebrating while hugging you♪

subtitles.original: キミをぎゅーできるのはモココだけなんだから！
subtitles.english: Because only Mococo can hug you!

subtitles.original: ほらほらキミも、モココのこともぎゅーっとして！
subtitles.english: C'mon, you hug Mococo too!

subtitles.original: せーの！今年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: One, two! We look forward to working with you this year too!
